generated_class_comment:
/**
 * The BeanVisitaPR class represents a visit made by a tourist to a restaurant point.
 * It stores information such as the rating given by the tourist, the ID of the restaurant point visited,
 * the comment left by the tourist, the ID of the tourist who made the visit, and the date of the visit.
 * 
 * This class provides methods to retrieve and set the values of these attributes, including:
 * - getCommento(): Returns the comment left by the tourist.
 * - setCommento(String): Sets a new comment for the visit.
 * - getDataVisita(): Returns the date of the visit.
 * - setDataVisita(Date): Sets a new date for the visit.
 * - getIdPuntoDiRistoro(): Returns the ID of the restaurant point visited.
 * - setIdPuntoDiRistoro(int): Sets a new ID for the restaurant point visited.
 * - getIdTurista(): Returns the ID of the tourist who made the visit.
 * - setIdTurista(int): Sets a new ID for the tourist who made the visit.
 * - getVoto(): Returns the rating given by the tourist for the visit.
 * - setVoto(int): Sets a new rating for the visit.
 * 
 * The class also includes two constructors:
 * - BeanVisitaPR(int pVoto, int pIdPuntoDiRistoro, String pCommento, int pIdTurista, Date pDataVisita):
 *   Constructs a new BeanVisitaPR object with the specified parameters.
 * - BeanVisitaPR():
 *   This is the default constructor for the BeanVisitaPR class, creating a new instance with no parameters.
 * 
 * Overall, the BeanVisitaPR class encapsulates the data related to a tourist visit and provides methods
 * to interact with and manipulate this data effectively.
 */
